text: Bhai Aishi, apni aise jyada baat nhi hui but mech me toh the hi saath me. Tu SAE me tha toh hard work and commitment, self defined hai. Mujhe ITC ka internship recruitment wala din to hamesha yaad rahega xD, specially tera HR interview aur wo same 2 questions jo baad me tujhse puchhe the! Uske baad M&A me same grp me kaam karna was a delight. AKA ke under toh backchod research kroge hi, bas isi tarah chaapta raho bhai. Keep working hard and All the best, for everything to come.
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Bhai, kya mast banda hai tu. Bc itni research kar li saath me, paper chhape diye, intern lagwa li aur kya chahiye, abhi bhi itna enthu hai ki 401 ke notes bana liye the tune. Kitna machana hai be! xD On a serious note, kaafi time spent kiya hai bhai tere saath lab me, bohot kuchh seekha bhi hai, treats bhi ki hai saath me, pehle whiskey shot bhi tere saath hi liya tha lol :p. Wo EHE ke experiments kaafi boring the but perseverance seekha hai lab me tere saath kaam karke. Your undying spirit to find solutions is surreal bhai, hands down. Yaad hai mujhe, tu bc puri H E Merritt padhke aa gya tha ek din me, leakage wali non-linearity ka model develop krne ke liye. Bhai mech me toh chaapa hi hai ultimate, ab EE me bhi phod. It was a delight working in the lab alongside you. Delhi trip hamesha yaad rahegi bhai! Itna fun free me xD Lockdown ho gya aur tu campus nhi aa paya. Apna last bye aur last lab treat reh gyi. But chill, Madlab will remain a platform for us to meet up sometime soon. Govind ki Thesis ki party bhi leni humko alag se. Tab tak aise hi chaapte raho bhai, take care, and all the best for the double major bro!
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Bhai Gangwar, inspiration hai tu bro. Robocon me hi mile the, aur tabhi se fan hu aapka. Itna talented, chaapu aur humble insaan nhi dekha bhai xD. Pehle CPI se jana tha, fir Robocon me saath me kaam kiya. Kaafi time sacrifice karna pada but bro tune saare efforts diye. MPID bhi implement kar hi diya successfully. MR1 was a great success! Fir toh jab bhi mile hai, baat hui hai, aur kabhi aapke chehre se hasi nhi hati. Sabki life me problems aati hai, tera intern wala time tough tha but fir hamesha comeback karna is what matters the most. Tere placement ke time pe dil se bohot khushi hui thi bhai. Your hard work is unmatched and will always pay off in whatever you do. Bas aise hi chaapte rho bhai aur hume mat bhul jaana xD. Aage fir milenge bhai, tab tak shukriya, aur All the best for everything to come.
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Aman bhai, kya bolun yaar tumhare baare me.. Itna chaapa hai tune, itna transformation and itna success gradient shayad hi kisi ne achieve kiya hoga. Hats off to your hard work and dedication bhai. You have always inspired me to push my limits. Your undying attitude, motivation for learning, absorbing capacity and thinking skills have always made me feel the unlimited potential in you. Hamari mulakat Robocon ke recruitment ke baad hi hui thi, Vivek ke through shayad. Initially shayad tu thoda inconfident tha, shayad baaki log sahi se nhi samjhte the but tujhse baat karke humesha ek dediccation wali feel aayi hai. Apne designs ko lekar, processes ko lekar, manufacturing methods ko lekar itne discussions hue hai ki mujhe kaafi seekhne ko mila hai. Tu hamesha question karta tha and cheezo ko sahi krne ki koshish krta tha. Tere inputs and efforts ke bina MR1 would never have existed. Last me jab MR1 me mere saath tu tha tab hamesha I felt supported. I knew ki mujhse jyada tu dekh rha hai sab, tujhe fikar hai cheezo ki. Kaafi kuchh seekha hai bhai tumhare saath kaam karke. Robocon ke baad kaafi confidence aaya hai mujhme bhi. Mujhe apna LHC Foyer me discussion yaad hai, intern ke time. Mujhe pata tha ki tu chaapega hi, kyunki kuchh bhi challenge ho, You never give up. Keep this determination towards your goals intact. You’ll reach much greater heights. Aur ab bade aadmi ho gye ho bhai, toh hume mat bhul jaana. Yaad kar liya kro kabhi kabhi. Fir zarur milenge bhai ME, Y17 ke reunion pe.
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Yo Aman,
What an inspiring personality you have been! Funnily enough, we were both on campus for a good two and half years and yet we first interacted at the HCIL HQ in Delhi. The Honda YES experience was definitely a memorable one. The ceremony was even better. And what a speech that was at the ceremony! and ofc, that completely defined your caliber! It's been great getting to know you and I have honestly learned a lot from you. Thank you for the good discussions while applying for YES plus earlier this year. I believe we'll be bearing the responsibility of doing the publicity for the YES program for some more time xD. So, definitely gonna be in touch. Cheers and All the best bhai!
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Anuj bhai, kabhi bhi le le party! aur jitni meri pending hai, utni teri bhi hai xD
Mene tujhse jyada chill banda nhi dekha bhai campus me. Your face in my memory is fixated with that smile of yours, and will remain so. Hamesha haste rehna bhai aise hi aur hasate rehna! 
First time tujhe aur Raghav ko Sunit ke room pe ladte hi dekha tha xD. Idk kaise tumne jhela hai mujhe aur Sunit ko 1st year me. Fir, the NYO intern. Kaafi achhe movie recommendations diye hai tune (The Prestige is one that I distinctly remember). Antaragni ke app ki saari beta testing to tumne hi ki hai bhai xD - wahan bhi kaafi sahi suggestions as always. Toh one thing I know for sure is, ki kabhi koi suggestion lena hua, then I know the guy to call (lol). 
Chaapa to har jagah hai hi tune, aise hi chapte reh bro! Fir milenge bhai kabhi treat dene lene ke liye xD.
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Archit bro! 1st sem se recall karna start karu toh sabse pehle Udghosh wale din hi yaad aate hai. The most I ever enjoyed any fest at IITK. Kitna kaam kiya tha humne milke Pankaj ke saath. First PoR, first team, and the very first feel of having a family at IITK was at Udhghosh’17. You’ve always inspired me a lot with all the hard work that you put in your roles. Udhghodh’18 toh tune hi sambhala single-handedly. I still regret for not being there ab sabse jyada zarurat thi. But uske baad bas chalte firte canteen, corridors me hi mil paaye hai. Last bye bolna bhi reh gya bhai. Chill hai, fir milenge. Take care and all the best for everything to come!
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
"A guy who dropped obsession to know the importance of life, happiness and relationships." - Can a bio get more apt! I still remember seeing the passion to build a team and taking it to heights in your eyes the day we sat together in Hall 2 Common Room. If there is one team of all I know, which can make a Quadruped move in a span of 2 hrs with a defective Maxon motor and a faulty circuit, it's that Robocon team. And it didn't come together, I was made - by us! Couldn't have imagined pulling off an inch of what we did in Robocon, had you not been there. I guess, janta toh me pehle hi tha ki Saini is the most passionate guy when it comes to Robotics, dekh bhi liya un 8-9 mahino me. Starting off from scratch is never easy. Never imagined ki ek team bana denge 10 din me jiske liye 550+ recruitment applications aa jayengi and SnT code me 1 question bhi ban jayega (ab reveal kar sakte hai na? xD). Wo SnT code wali raat bhai, kitne maze kiye the.. and uske baad, the entire Robocon journey. 2.5 saal ki campus life me 1 saal to MR1 MR2 hi banate rahe xD. But it has been one of the most centerpiece learnings of my campus life, and all credits to you! Wo saare birthday celebrations yaad hai, saari meetings me backchodi yaad hai, saare serious discussions bhi yaad hai xD
You are a truly special person. Bohot kind, caring and courageous. Tujhse hi kaafi confidence mila hai kaafi cheeze karne ka. Thank you “Saini”, for making me believe that a bunch of inexperienced guys can actually create an autonomous bot and a quadruped from a nominal budget and in an unrealistic time frame. Ever grateful for everything. You have a brave heart and I know, you’ll do great in life ahead and forever! Aur Robocon ke reunion pe milte hai fir xD
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Vaibhav bhai! Hahah, literally weird memory hi bolenge usse. I was grateful bhai tune mujhe puchha seconder ke liye, fir baad me Nikunj ke liye ki campaigning but maza aaya tha baat karke. All in all I was happy ki dono candidates jinhe support kiya (directly/indirectly) jeet gye wo xD and tbh, what a tenure you both have pulled out out of a pandemic. kaafi backchod kaam kiya bhai and zarur kabhi sath me milke chill karte hai. Cheers and all the best bhai!
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Yo Ayush! Sabse cool and out of the league banda in mech xD. Bhai, kya chaapu ho yaar tum. Courses me, AUV me, JPMC me - har jagah ultimate chapa hai bhai _/\_ It was truly a bliss to have collaborated (:p) with you in dept. labs, courses and in SnT. 401 ke uss quiz ke confession mail ka itna in-depth discussion yaad rahega bhai xD Sahi, suggestion tha tera, degree mil ayegi bhai uss decision ki wajah se, lol. Great to have met you on campus. Aage bhi mauka mila toh zarur milenge bhai. All the best for everything ahead!
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Okay, I might agree on the anti-me point xD but what coincidences! Kitna kuchh same raha hai, kitne experiences common hai and kitni moments bhi share kiye hai. Would always remember your hug at the SPO office after ITC’s interview results came in. Itne parallels hai that it seems like what I’ve done on campus has been defined by you. And in true sense, that is the proof ki tune kitne inspire kiya hai mujhe. Tera commitment and approach towards things and life, in general are commendable! Glad to have been alongside you on so many occasions. Mechanical me saath me, then ITC, and AnC. Have learnt so much from you all-throughout. Aur ab toh chill kar bhai xD aur kitna machana hai. SRC wrap up krne ke baad tere saath wo chat will always be the first nostalgic moment when I realised that the time spent together with you and everyone at IITK is near to ending. But surely, a lot of treats pending so, yes, a lot of meetups awaiting :p. Thanks and Cheers, to everything that we've done together Bhavjeet. And All the best, for everything to come.
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
The most down to earth, humble, multi talented and caption creative guy I've met on campus, Divyansh Sir! _/\_
Kanpur ke logo me alag hi feel hoti hai, bade pyare hote hai. Aap bhi Kanpur ke hai, hum bhi paas hi ke hai :p, alag hi connect hai bas.
NYO me hi mile the shayad sabse pehle. Pro-coder toh aap pehle se hi rhe hai, fir Dept me mulakat hui. Aur fir baad me Robocon. Wo nightouts bakhubi yaad hai. Wo Cricket match bhi yaad hai, uske baad kiya Hall 13 ka breakfast bhi. Kaafi achha time tha, jitna kaam kiya tha saath me utni yaade bhi hai. Itna explore karne ka patience toh sabke paas nhi hota, but hum saath me NYO se Robocon se Mech tak explore hi kr rhe the xD. Ek never settle wala attitude seekha hai aapse. Aise hi usse banaye rakhiyega.. Kyunki aage bhi chaapna hi hai aapko! Jab bhi mile hai, “aur bhai?” barkarar rakha hai, ab milenge fir se “aur bhai!” barkarar rakhne ke liye. All the best bhai. Keep doing great stuff.
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Yo Boss, See ya later.
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Bola tha na nhi likhunga. Nhi likhunga. bohot alas aa rha hai. itna likhne se better ek line hai mere paas. Aage jab bhi ye padhna to whatsapp kholna, aur ye line send kar dena bas - "Up for a call?"
Toh aaj me bhi nhi likh rha kuchh, jyada janne ki utsukta ho toh, Up for a call?
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Hi Krishan. Sahi me, I regret meeting you so late but jo bhi hai thanks to Jay and that collaboration in Policy Conclave 2019 that I got to know you. Whenever I’ve seen you, I vividly remember that constant smile on your face and an unmatched energy. Such a humble person with such chapuness is rare to see. Last me apne cricket moments yaad rahenge xD, nobody can get you out of the corridor for sure :p. It was fun to meet you bro, would look to catch up sometime somewhere. All the best, till then!
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Yo Maitreyee!
You’re a pure-hearted, chaotic and yet at peace person (idk how!). Congratulations on having done all possible bakchodi on campus. Was nice to stick to the phone for 6 hrs straight and discuss random stuff altogether. Campus se jaate jaate ek accha kaam kar liya, wo call attend krne ka xD Kaafi nostalgia tha uss time, and uss nostalgia me tum bhi ho ab :p. Thank you for the dailing the right (wrong? No, right!) number. :D
Keep that fun loving part of yours intact, kyunki backchodi nhi rukni chahiye xD. Be calm as you are and keep working hard as you do. You're gonna achieve much greater heights. All the best for everything to come. Cheers!
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Arrey Sir! Ye toh constant hi rahega bhai, jab bhi milenge, because aap Sir hi deserve karte hai Sir xD. Bhai kuchh log ki presence hamesha hi feel hoti hai, you’re one of those few. Hall 12 canteen jaa rhe ho aur aap na mile, aisa toh nhi ho sakta tha xD. And I have always admired the way to used to take up responsibilities and manage everything with the constant smile on your face. Jab bhi mile hai, I have seen you with the same smile and same enthu. Keep it on bhai. Aero me sahi me kisi ne chaapa hai aur mujhe personally inspire kiya hai toh wo aap hai. Research, SnT, Hall and maratha wale feel, kaafi kuchh common hai. 5th sem (before lockdown), YashRaj ke saath same project me the toh kaafi mulakat wese hi ho jaati thi. Kitna bhi time gap ho jaye but ig hum log baat krne ke liye topics nikal hi lenge. Itna chaapte aa hi rhe hai 1st year se, aage toh aur chaapoge hi. Aur itne sab ke baad bhi, such humbleness! Learnt a lot from you bhai, keep this undying enthu intact. I’ll be in touch, aage fir zarur milenge. All the best and take care bro.
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Toast me jab tak meri baari aayi thi tab tak toh tum ghar pe the aur Covid positive bhi. But anyway, lagta nhi ki mujhe shabdo me likhni ki koi zarurat hai. You’re been the smartest and the most intelligent person I know (Most fit bhi xD). You can do anything in life, you have all the abilities to achieve what you wish for. Your discipline is what I can just imagine to attain. Your attitude is an ‘ideal’ to everyone. As a person, I don’t know a more helping and thoughtful guy than you. Mere paas to na kabhi shabd the aur na kabhi rahenge tumhe itni anginat cheezo ke liye “Thank you” bolne ke liye. Tujhe pata hi hoga me kitna grateful hu un sab cheezo ke liye and kitna respect karta hu tujhe, as a friend, as a person jiske thoughts unconventional hai aur apne unique hai, based on a clear foundation of ideas and a strong ideology. I’ve learnt a lot over these 4 years from you. Enjoyed a lot more, with you. This bond of ours is pure one, where things are less said but more understood, calls made less frequent but thoughts of each other, come more often. Wese tujhe kehne ki zarurat hi nhi padti aur tu sab samjh bhi jaata hai. Just so much grateful for everything! Best advisor in a lot of things. Best person to get inspired from. And I can just keep on writing more… I’ll miss you but hum toh milte rahenge. Toh aur kuchh kehne ki zarurat nhi hai. Bas apne unconventional thoughts ko aise hi rakhna, apne dreams ko chase krte rehna, kyunki ye tera passion kaafi logo ko strength deta hai including me. Nobody can stop you. Fir bhi, All the best bhai, ultimate chapna life me. Fir milenge. Shukriya!
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Neelesh bro, what an amazing experience it has been! Getting to know you was great, getting to work with you was a delight truly. Definitely missed you during SRC’21 (specially jab bachhe kuchh nhi kar rhe the xD). But honestly, itna enthu nhi dekha mene kisi me to work with such rigour for any role. You single handedly managed MnC at some point, I just know this :). Really appreciate your step of being honest, taking a stand for your decision and giving me a genuine feedback over that call about where we were heading as a Wing/Council. Baaki same hall, same Maratha feel was always intact. First years se hi close neighbours the, and hopefully aage bhi milenge. Stay in touch bhai. And fir treat pending hai Research Wing ki xD. Take care and All the best bro!
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Nimish bhai.. sabse humble & happy, chill & chaapu!
Jab bhi mile hai, "aur bhai? bas bhai!" toh kar hi liya hai humne apna xD. Ye Bro code toh intact hi rahega. Mulakat toh 1st year me hi ho gyi thi, jab me Sunit ke room pe TA ke assignments karne aata tha xD. Thakkar Sir ke room me pro-coding krte hi dekha hai saath me tujhe. Bohot hard work kiya hai bhai tune.. have been with you through the NYO intern. Apni Lucknow wali trip yaad hai xD - MLH Hackathon ke liye gaye (Lol!). Bhai, bohot maze kiye hai, will never forget that Lucknow visit - Aisa random plan and fir chutiya katana yaad rahega.. abhi bhi soch ke hasi nhi ruk rhi. Aise hi cool and classic rehna bhai. All the best aage ke liye.. aur fir kabhi kisi Hackathon me chutiya katane chalenge saath me :D
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Gawds! _/\_
The most awesome, hardworking, phodu and yet down-to-earth guy on campus. Bhai itna kuchh common rha hai ki I don't even know if there is any point of writing this. But, to start off, Mech and SnT me kaam kiya and karte dekha which was a bliss for me. Intern day 1 hamesha yaad rahega mujhe, there liye samosa leke aaya that before your HUL interview xD and what a way to get a Day 1 Intern! Hats off to your dedication bhai. I've always admired your work and you, as a person. Itna chaapu and yet humble insaan nhi dekha bhai. EE650 me collaborate karna, Intern time pe discussions on projects and Interrobang further ahead, all in all a great experience by the closure. On campus bhi mil liye bhai, last bye bolne ka chance bhi mil gya (Send me that first and last pic of ours agar hai there paas toh xD). GSoc bhi clear and dual me bhi chaap rha ab! Research and robotics have been my passion and something that you are doing (always have been!) and isiliye I'm sure ki aage baat toh hoti rahegi. After all, there's still a lot to learn from you. Keep up the undying enthu that you have. Keep replying you my FB stories :p, and treats pending hai bhai! Cheers and all the best for everything to come.
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Bhai pranam _/\_
Sabse pehle toh ye kehna chahenge ki aapke sang bitaye sabhi pal anmol hai aur sadayev hi yaad rahenge. Apke jaise khushnuma aur mast maula insaan apne aap me hi prerna ka strot hai. Jitna saral, down-to-earth aur humble vyaktitva hai aapka aur jo aap krte hai, jis level pe aap chaapte hai, dono ki match nhi karte par dono hi kabiliyat tareef hai. First year se hi jante the bhai, Naman ke bachpan ke mitra aur SAE ke pramukh member, wing E5 ke niwasi, Shri Parth Luwaria Ji. Fir bhai, 2nd year me winter's me ruke the toh kaafi kaam karte dekha, seekha aapse. Sabhi courses me saath raha hi hai aapka, bohot sahayta ki hai aapne. Pizza party bhi yaad hai. Dec me hum ghumne nikle the, neemuch hi aa jate bhai milne par samay ki kami pad gyi thi. Canteen me baith ke gush-shup bhi ki hai, sunahre din the bhai wo. Aapke saath bitaye saare pal khushi ke rhe hai, aage bhi zarur milte rahenge bhai. Bhuliyega nahi hume. 
Aapke aabhari!
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Bhai itni humble voice and hamesha khush! Jab bhi mile hai, same smile dekhi hai mene. Aur Mech gawd hai bhai tu! Itna toh koi kaise chaap sakta hai. Teri journey (jitni me janta hu, JEE ke time se Saksham ne bataya tha) mere liye kaafi inspiring rahi hai. Jitna hard work and sincerity se tu har cheez karta hai, mene kaafi seekha hai. Techkriti ke time Robotics Club me tera work dedication toh dekha hi tha. Bas aise hi backchod kaam karte raho bhai, and hume guide karte raho. _/\_
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Yo Priank,
Kyun hai itna khush tu? Everytime I have seen you, it's been with a wide smile on your face. "Aur bhai, kaisa hai?" has been and will be our bro-code xD
Kahan kahan nhi machaya hai tune and yet, itna down to earth rehta hai. Backchodi is your premier league, will always be. Ye Aero wale sab itne litt log mile hai. Ek wo chhotu hai, Yash Raj, ek wo motu hai, Aviral xD.. Ek tu hai jo sober bhi, high lagta hai. Remain this way, backchod, friendly and khush (bina wajah). Your passion for robotics is inspiring, man. Tera publication bhi dekha tha and it tells the efforts you have put in. Be it taking AUV to greater heights or be it getting high yourself xD, you’ve done a great job altogether (No, seriously! :D).
Aise hi chapte reh bhai.. All the best for everything to come. Cheers!
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Aur brsdk! So ja.
"Aui neend badi auindiii, you just wanna sleep oyee"
Love you 3e3 :^ xD
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Bhai, ‘How did I pass you up?’ xD
The coolest guy I’ve met, hands down. I remember all the moments with you so vividly ‘coz they all have been so beautiful. From the first birthday celebration at CCD to the last hug before leaving campus! Although Sunit’s been the thread connecting us, but at least the connection is intact. Always will be so. Thank you for all those cheerful moments, for the first birthday wish on campus, for those high-spirited football matches and what not. Take care bhai, fir milenge! All the best for everything to come.
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Das bro! Hail AutoMAT, yes. Jan pehchan ko 1st year se thi, Das for RRCC xD Ex-HEC bc, full respect for that tenure. Pehle bas itna hi janta tha ki mech me sabse phodu hai, fir Humanoid me dekha kaam karte hue, ekdum alag level chaapte the bhai tum log. Respect stonks up! Courses me toh kitna collaborate kya hai bhai, tu nhi hota toh pass kaise hote xD 
401 ke quizzes se lekar 668 ke assignments tak bhai! But sab ek taraf aur apna Bajaj MACH ek taraf. Kya sahi tha wo bhi. Remotely kaam karna wahi se start kiya tha. When the world was planning to start WFH, we were doing it in real time :p. Bishakh Sir ke under toh 2nd year se chaap rha hai aage bhi chaapte hi rahega. Mech me tu hi hi inspiration rha hai , aise hi inspire krte rehna apne kaam se. Thank you for all of this. Take care bhai and all the best for everything ahead. Aur fir, hum toh touch me rahenge hi. Mech is lub.
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Tere liye kya memoir likhna hai bhai. Apna safar to iss IITK ki journey se kaafi pehle se shuru ho gya tha, and kaafi baad tak milte hi rahenge for sure. But theek hai, aaj tak aise mauka nhi mila kyunki hum dono hi kaafi cool kism ke log hai xD Jay jitni emotional baate nhi likhni aati par haan, tum ho toh bilkul alag personality. 11th me toh darr lagta tha bhai, isaan hai ya bhagwan. Sab pata rehta hai, sab padha hua hai.. Lagta tha wapas JEE de rha hai humare saath, ek do baar nikal hi rakha hoga pehle xD Wese mujhse jyada darr BNM Sir ko lagta tha tbh (haha, lol).
Anyway, wo bhi “badiya” din the, kyunki tumhare saath sab badiya hi hota hai. JEE ki prep time ki best memories tere saath hi hai kyunki tu hi itna serious tha poore batch me xD. Tests ke baad paper discuss krna toh 11th se hi hai. Pehle sirf meri faadta tha, baad me poore wing ki (specially, buchas fuffa) xD
Last paper ke baad CP ke samne khade hoke “All the Best” bola tha jab, tab laga tha shayad last time mil rhe hai.. but kya coincidence tha bhai! Same IIT, Same Hall, Same Wing. “Hum Alwar se aaye hai!” will remain our tagline. College me bhi nhi sudhre tum (actually, bigde). Abhi tak wahi Sabhay ho jo sabse jyada magta hai, sabke doubts solve krta hai (CP se hi hai ye to), sab padha sakta hai before exams (kuchh ECO wale log toh isi bharose pass ho rhe hai EE ke courses me xD). But bhai, tera dedication _/\_, mene toh kaafi pehle chhod diya tha but you took this to another level. No doubt you deserve to be at the Top in whatever you do ahead. Your hard work shows, in whatever you have achieved. Kaafi inspire kiya hai bhai itne saal. Tum kar rhe the itni mehnat shayad isiliye sabne kr li thodi bohot jitni ki hai. Robocon ka MPID algorithm toh alag level tha xD xD. Tujhse jyada cool, calm and courageous banda nhi dekha bhai. Kaafi pessimistic hai bas, kabhi toh achha soch liya kar. EE360 me tere hisaab se fail hi ho rhe the hum log at one point. Glad to have travelled this journey with you and literally bhi IITK tak ka safar (Train wala bhi aur life wala bhi) hamesha tumhare saath hi rha hi aur aage bhi rahega (Train wala bhi, Train-Bus-Air wala bhi - Alwar to Aurangabad ka algo figure out kr lena bas). Theek hai, agar yahan tak tumne padha hai (which I doubt,.. beech me chala gya hoga PMI ka project krne), to ye bhi sun lo sehat ka dhyaan rakho aur jeevan me ab thodi aish krlo (#taalis lakh ka sahi upyog krne ke liye tau ko sampark kare, investment se expenditure ki saari maths bata denge). Theek hai bhai, “badiya!”.
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Saksham bro. Abhi likhne ka fayda bhi hai? agar ye 11.40 tak visible kiya toh 11.55 tak wait karna, naya likhke post karunga. lagta nhi tu dekhne wala hai abhi portal xD
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Yo Sathvik! 
Bhai kya machaya hai mech me tune. Tu nhi hota toh kaise paas hote courses me xD
First year me ESC Labs me time spent kiya tha and then, 2nd year ke courses me. Remember the TA202 project? Tere dabbe pe CAD banaya tha shayad last me, bhai kya maze kiye the. I have always perceived you as the most studious, serious guy in the grp. I never was, for sure. But you have definitely inspired me in a lot of ways to focus more and shayad last tak thoda padh liye isiliye. Online sem me bhi saath me exams dena was the only fun moment I remember in the entire lockdown. I used to look up to exams to collaborate and get together to discuss stuff. Trips me bhi ultimate maze kiye hai bhai tere saath. Diu beach wali recording will remain the best. I’ve always enjoyed your company, I know aise jyada baat nhi hoti shayd apni and I apologise for that. I’ll try better ab xD Still, spending the last days on campus with you is something I’ll always cherish. Cricket khelna (read pehli ball pe clean bold hona xD), running jana, khana order karna, Mama Mio visits, ME627 ke assignments samjhna, MS related discussion with Utkarsh and much more. Thank you for all those moments. Looking forward to meeting you over our next trip. Till then, take care. Be cool as you are. Be smart as you are. And keep growing as you always have been. Cheers and All the best bhai!
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Do I even need to write a memoir? I am the official and the only “Sunit ka chodu”. Ye mukaam milna is in itself an achievement and speaks of itself. Reflects how much you have shaped me over these years and how much you have inspired me, through every project/course we did together. 1st day of classes, tab se shuru hoke, last day on campus tak! You have been my undefined best friend. Haan ab baat utni nhi ho paati but baaton ki zarurat kise hai. Just grateful for so many moments that I spent with you. So many songs that we jammed together. TA101 ki sleepless nights, subah PE101 me running, tiring but ‘precisely’ satisfactory PHY101 labs, Antaragni’18 - the first ever app ever built, and in what fashion!, ME251 ke assignments, TA201/202 ke projects, ever-soothing football matches, Josh ka gold medal jeetna, random project ideas and countless things to mention in this memoir. Just can’t do this. Bas aage milte rahenge and tab tak, keep this never ending enthu and this fire within to create, alive. Take care bhai, All the best aage ke liye, and Shukriya for everything!
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Sir! _/\_
pi log u
*Insert memoir*
Okay, Sir. _/\_
author: Suyash  Singh

text:
Sir. Respect ++
Bhai kahan se shuru karu, sab toh janta hi hai tu. Since ye printed form me aane wala hai, I can only write ki jab bhi padhna, call kar lena bhai. Kisi bhi random technical topic pe discussion start kr denge :p. Because ig that’s one strong thing connecting us together. Right from 1st year, Code Fun Do me collaborate karne se start kiya (Technical Checkpoint #1), fir NYO (Technical Checkpoint #2) - tere saath hi puri intern ki hai bhai wo toh. Shikher ke under same team me kaam karna was a delight! Then, came 2nd year apne kuchh courses common hue (Technical Checkpoint #3). Thermo ki class me quora ke answers padhte the xD. Bhai fir apna Flutter wala discussion, IITK ke 2 major fests ke 1st ever apps apni wing se hi develop hue hai and guess the developers (Technical Checkpoint #4). Fir tu bangalore me macha rha tha, hum log world cup dekh rhe the xD. Intern season me you were a constant information source (Technical Checkpoint #5), GD preparation se leke resume discussions tak, bohot help ki hai bhai. Shayad kabhi formally “Thank you” nhi bol paaya, it was known ig but wo as a feel hamesha thi aur rahegi. Then tune EE me double major ki uspe kaafi discussion hua and I feel it was one the best decisions you made. Software se core ka jump is something that takes a lot of perspective, belief and guts. You have it all. I am amazed and inspired by all that you have been doing since then. EE ke courses pe discussion, IP me itna collaboration xD (Technical Checkpoint #6). Fir toh bhai, apni Dec trip to MP. Itni backchodi bhai. You were the partner in crime for sure, mauj lene se lekar meme game tak, kya sync hai apna. Bhai last months on campus were beautiful with you. Late nights and seemingly important but random discussions on engineering, tech, Julia and core sector ka future were my most exciting talks, still gives me chills (Technical Checkpoint #n). Running with airpods, listening to Brown Munde on loop, getting clean bold on the first ball xD, untimely sabbaticals, Managing Jay Gupta, Paneer banana, Peg banana, sab kar liya bhai saath me. I don’t have words beyond this point. I’m just so much drowned in nostalgia. You have been the centerpiece of everything we have done in the last few days at IITK, will definitely miss those moments badly. Buchas bc ne account hi nhi banaya hai, warna uska bhi likhta. Anyway, concluding all of it, I really appreciate ki tune busy hone ke baad bhi itna time spend kiya hamare saath. I really respect your work, am a fan tbh and you know this. Bas bhai, itna grow kiya hai tune in every aspect of life ki you definitely were and will be the pro-est of the pros. Fuffa naam toh mene hi diya hai, but Sir ki upadhi bhi aapki hi hai haq se. Bas Sir kripa banaye rakhiyega, aapke raj me jee rhe hai bas xD
Chaliye, namaste. Shukriya. Charan Sparsh. Bhuliyega mat hume, aapke shubhchintak _/\_
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Yash bhai, I always feel that your’s is a path which you chose, constructed and travelled through on your own. Yes, first year se hi jante hai hum. Ig kisi GC event me hi mile the xD Fir saath me as SGs and then as AMs achha time spent kiya. And then Ayushya ke room pe kaam karna was so much fun. Steering committee se Chairperson tak, apna connection through Senate has been special. Lockdown nhi hota toh aur kaam karte saath me. Senate ko manage karna in an online year was such a challenge and man, how good have you done that! I can vouch for this specially because offline Senate meetings manage karna was so hectic (we have seen Ayushya managing things somehow xD), lucky to have worked in parallel (if not alongside) in the AnC both in 3rd and 4th year. Apni AnC ki core team meets Sethi ke saath will remain in good memory. Bohot mulakat hui hai, now that I think of it, but kabhi treat pe nhi jaa paaye, and there are enough pending xD. Kaafi machaya hai bhai tune, aage bhi aise hi chaapte rehna. Keep the spirit intact. You’ve done a great deal for the student body throughout the last tenure and before that as well. Thanks for all the good times. I’ll stay in touch, milte rahenge. Cheers and All the best bhai!
author: Suyash  Singh

text: Brsdk!

text: Aur bsdk? kabhi padhne nhi waale tum ye memoir. deadline nikal jayegi. bsdk hi rahoge laude ki. Chalo mast hai. Love you!
